WHAT IS CRYPTOGRAPHY ? The method of translating ordinary plain text into unintelligible text is synonymous with cryptography, and vice-versa. It is a way of storing and distributing information in a specific form such that it can be read and interpreted by only those by which it is intended. Not only does cryptography shield information from manipulation or modification, but it can also be used for authentication by users. Earlier cryptography was efficiently associated with secrecy, but cryptography today is largely focused on mathematical theory and practice in computer science. SCOPES OF CRYPTOGRAPHY Confidentiality - Information cannot be understood by anyone which is why studying on how crypto currency can be protected is very essential. CRYPTO RIG MINER & REVIVAL (RV-64)TECH (DIGITAL CURRENCY REVERSAL TECH) Integrity - Information cannot be altered. Non-repudiation - Sender cannot deny his/her intentions in the transmission of the information at a later stage Authentication - Sender and receiver can confirm each Cryptography is used in many applications like banking transactions cards, computer passwords, and e- commerce transactions. MODRN CRYPTOGRAPHIC TECHNIQUES Symmetric-key Cryptography: Both the sender and receiver share a single key. The sender uses this key to encrypt plaintext and send the cipher text to the receiver. On the other side the receiver applies the same key to decrypt the message and recover the plain text.Public-Key Cryptography: This is the most revolutionary concept in the last 300-400 years. In Public-Key Cryptography two related keys (public and private key) are used. Public key may be freely distributed, while its paired private key, remains a secret. The public key is used for encryption and for decryption private key is used.Hash Functions: No key is used in this algorithm. A fixed-length hash value is computed as per the plain text that makes it impossible for the contents of the plain text to be recovered. Hash functions are also used by many operating systems to encrypt passwords.WHY BLOCKCHAIN IS USED FOR CRYPTOCURRENCY ? Decentralized networks that need a cryptocurrency may be allowed by blockchains. The blockchain is the technology that functions as the public ledger which enables trust to be established by a network. Distributed consensus allows transactions to be monitored by the network , which allows value which knowledge transfer. The tokens used within these networks to transfer value and pay for these transfers are cryptocurrencies, or to have network rewards. In addition, you can see them on the blockchain as a tool, acting as a resource or service in certain situations, or also digitizing an asset's possession.
